Module org.neo4j.driver
Package org.neo4j.driver.internal.async.connection

Class DirectConnection

java.lang.Object
org.neo4j.driver.internal.async.connection.DirectConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Connection
public class DirectConnection extends Object implements Connection
This is a connection used by DirectConnectionProvider to connect to a remote database.
